* Diana nodded.*

� Looked kinda like a cockroach to me.�

* She snickered. Swordance was a rather funny character, and she use to 
laugh for hours just watching Rion try and do the instruction what were 
given to him by that instructor. Even though she tried to keep quiet, 
sometimes she would chuckle too loudly and Swordance would come rushing out 
and babble at her in some tongue she didn�t understand. Sounding like some 
autiotape wound backwards.
Diana chuckled. That bot was always good for chuckle.
But Diana�s smile turned to that of concern as Rion explained that 
everything would be alright. He always said things like that when times 
turned rough, and in a time like this she really wanted her mother.
Diana nearly jumped with fright as Rion leapt to his feet and extended a 
hand toward her, leaving her all wide eyed and her fur all bristled.
She didn�t take his hand as she got to his feet, feeling a little better, 
but not too much. Diana pointed the way she had come. *

� Okay. But not that way. There�s a big harry spider.� She sat back on her 
honches and made wriggling motions like spider legs with her paws, also 
laying her ears back against her head and making a disgusted face. *

� Icky!�

*Diana straightened herself then and then trotted up the nearest sandbank, 
looking around and sighing. *

� There�s nothing to explore!� She called back down to Rion. � It�s all sand 
and bugs and stuff!�
